name: Extreme Times
description:
Alan, a teenager locked down in the pandemic, during 2020, gets bored and start toying with his Grandpa's wrist watch. Little does he know that his Grandpa was a famous scientist, who did secret projects for the government.

Suddenly he finds himself teleported to a strange place. Why everyone knows him? Why is there a grave with his name written on it? He must talk to people, find missing pieces and evidences and complete the whole story.
